SEARCH
Module carter.stech.librarysystemv2
Package carter.stech.librarysystemv2

Class Book

java.lang.Object
carter.stech.librarysystemv2.Book
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Book extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a book in the library system. Implements JavaFX properties for data binding and serialization.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Book

      public Book(String title, String author, String isbn, boolean isAvailable, String borrowedBy, LocalDate dueDate)
      Constructs a new Book object with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the book.
      author - The author of the book.
      isbn - The ISBN (or custom book ID) of the book.
      isAvailable - The availability status of the book.
      borrowedBy - The user who borrowed the book (if applicable).
      dueDate - The due date of the book (if applicable).

    • isAvailable

      public boolean isAvailable()
      Checks if the book is available.
      Returns:
      True if the book is available, false otherwise.

    • setAvailable

      public void setAvailable(boolean available)
      Sets the availability status of the book. If set to available, the borrower and due date will be reset.
      Parameters:
      available - The availability status.

    • availableProperty

      public javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty availableProperty()
      Gets the availability property for JavaFX bindings.
      Returns:
      The BooleanProperty of the availability.
      See Also:
      • isAvailable()
      • setAvailable(boolean)

    • getDueDate

      public LocalDate getDueDate()
      Gets the due date of the book.
      Returns:
      The due date, or null if not applicable.

    • getBorrowedBy

      public String getBorrowedBy()
      Gets the ID of the borrower.
      Returns:
      The borrower's ID or null if the book is available.
